HomePage.HeadingTitle: AIDA Queen Palace | Luxury Beach Resort in Induruwa, Sri Lanka
HomePage.HeadingDescription: Book your stay at AIDA Queen Palace, a luxury beachfront resort in Induruwa, Sri Lanka – offering ocean-view rooms, pool, dining, in-house coffee shop, and 5-star service near Bentota.
HomePage.HeadingKeywords: AIDA Queen Palace, Luxury Beach Resort, Induruwa, Sri Lanka, Ocean-View Rooms, Beachfront Accommodation, Pool, Dining, In-House Coffee Shop, 5-Star Service, Bentota Hotels
HomePage.ImageFullGridDescription: AIDA Queen Palace, a luxury beach resort in Sri Lanka nestled on the golden shores of Induruwa, just minutes from Bentota. Located 8 km south of Bentota on the island’s scenic west coast, our resort offers an idyllic tropical escape with direct beachfront access and world-class amenities.

DiningSection.description: Savor the flavors of Sri Lanka and beyond at our signature Ocean Breeze Restaurant, set just meters from the shore with uninterrupted sea views.
